description: A medieval knight with a shield, Francis, standing in a green field with a castle in the distance
text: Francis: I must protect the kingdom from the dragon.

description: A princess with long hair, Madeline, looking sad in a royal room with elegant furniture
text: Madeline: The dragon was my friend, why is Francis attacking it?

description: Francis, the knight, riding on horseback towards the castle with determination
text: Francis: I will slay the dragon and save the kingdom!

description: Madeline, the princess, running towards the castle gates with tears in her eyes
text: Madeline: Stop, Francis! The dragon is innocent!

description: Francis, the knight, standing face to face with the dragon in a fiery battleground
text: Francis: I must fulfill my duty and defeat the dragon.

description: Madeline, the princess, embracing the dragon in a peaceful meadow
text: Madeline: Thank you for always protecting me, my dear friend.
